title: Login Issues - Can't Access
description: Customer is unable to log in after multiple password reset attempts.

title: Payment Gateway Timeout
description: Customer reports that the payment process times out at checkout.

title: Unable to Download Invoice
description: Customer cannot download their January invoice from billing section.

title: Email Notifications Not Received
description: Customer does not receive any order confirmation or reset emails.

title: App Crash on Launch
description: Mobile app crashes immediately on startup for Android 13 users.

title: Slow Dashboard Loading
description: Dashboard takes more than 30 seconds to load after login.

title: Two-Factor Authentication Issue
description: Customer is not receiving 2FA codes on their registered phone.

title: Search Function Not Working
description: Search bar does not return any results even for valid queries.

title: Subscription Auto-Renewal
description: Customer unable to enable auto-renewal toggle for subscription.

title: Report Export Failure
description: Exported reports generate corrupted files when opened in Excel.

title: Profile Picture Upload Error
description: Uploading profile images always results in an error message.

title: Password Reset Link Expired
description: Reset links expire within 2 minutes, causing login issues.

title: Mobile Notifications Delayed
description: Push notifications are delayed by more than 15 minutes.

title: Order History Not Displayed
description: Customer order history section is empty despite multiple orders.

title: Live Chat Not Connecting
description: Customer unable to connect to agents through live chat option.
